feature.label: JQuest Plugin
feature.description: Jquest Plugin project aims to develop Eclipse refactoring plugins that facilitate in the process of achieving software modularity. The CARE plugin deals with four types of antipatterns: circular dependencies between packages, subtype knowledge, abstraction without decoupling, and degenerated inheritance.
